description: Dashboard showing Prometheus Alertmanager metrics for observing status of the cluster and possible debbuging.

panels.description: Number of AM instances managing alert notifications
panels.title: Instances

panels.description: Current number of receivers (notification methods email,pagerduty...)
panels.title: Receivers

panels.description: Table containing list of Alertmanager instances showing it's version, up time, last reload time and if it was successful.
panels.title: Instance versions and up time

panels.description: Number of alerts by state such as `active`, `suppressed` etc.
panels.title: Alert States

panels.description: Number of received alerts from Prometheus by status `firing` on positive axis and `resolved` on negative axis.
panels.title: Received Alert Status

panels.description: Number of sent notifications to distinct integrations such as PagerDuty, Slack and so on. On negative axis are displayed failed notifications.
panels.title: Notifications Sent

panels.description: Duration of notification sends in 0.99 and 0.9 quantiles per integration.
panels.title: Notification Duration Integrations

title: Prometheus Alertmanager
